message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $925,000.  I believe this represents a fair starting point for our discussion.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but my initial price reflects the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down slightly to $900,000. This is my final offer, as I have another interested buyer.

I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $875,000 for the product. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
